properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the Paragraph.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the Paragraph with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the Paragraphs within the specified range.

parameters.description: The Paragraph, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Paragraph, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The Paragraph, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Paragraph, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first Paragraph in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last Paragraph in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle Paragraph in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the Paragraph with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the Paragraph that follows the desired Paragraph.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the Paragraph whose index follows the specified Paragraph in the collection.

parameters.description: The Paragraph whose index comes before the desired Paragraph.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any Paragraph in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every Paragraph in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Paragraph.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the Paragraph with the specified index.
